name: @shadowspawn/forest-arborist
description: Forest Arborist. A loosely coupled repository manager inspired by Mercurial subrepositories, npm, and Git.

scripts.copy-up: git checkout master && git merge develop && echo "tip: run npm version patch, then npm publish"
scripts.copy-down: git checkout develop && git merge master && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch
scripts.test:install: npm unlink . && npm uninstall -g . && npm install -g . && npm run test:fabonly

author: John Gee
